pageProduct.name: A'kin Natural Deodorant 150ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Geranium & Cedarwood Natural Deodorant is free from Triclosan, Aluminium and Zinc with natural odour control technology.

Providing odour- neutralising care, this natural deodorant contains a delicate blend of Geranium, Cedarwood and Patchouli oil selected for its deodorising properties, leaving your skin feeling clean, refreshed and comfortable.

*Formulated without Aluminium* Salts or Zinc* Phenosulfonate.

Size: 150mL

Warnings

CAUTION: Highly flammable liquid and vapour. Causes serious eye irritation. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. If eye irritation persists, seek medical attention. Keep away from heat & hot surfaces. Keep container tightly closed. We recommend patch testing before use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Ethanol*, Water (Aqua), Glycerin*, Triethyl Citrate*, Glucose*, Rapeseed Acid*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil*, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Leaf Oil*, Cedrus Atlantica (Cedarwood) Wood Oil*, Benzyl alcohol, Limonene^, Linalool^

*from Botanical source, ^natural component of essential oil

Directions

After cleansing, spray directly onto underarm area.
